item.name: `4`l[ATP]`r Attacker Upgrade
item.lore: `cUse this currency in the|`cAttacker Upgrade shop.||`oTo keep across lives|`ostore in Enderchest.|

broadcasts.alert: `r`f`lDestroy the Red Team's two obsidian Nuclei to win!`r
`r`f`lDestroy the Blue Team's two obsidian Nuclei to win!`r
broadcasts.tip: `r`e`lCollect `6`lGlowstone `r`e`lfrom spawners for the Team Upgrade shop.`r
`r`c`lEarn `4`lRedstone`r`c`l from kills for Attacker Upgrade shop purchases.`r
`r`9`lDig `2`lDirt`r`9`l to buy gear in the underground Defender Upgrade shop.`r
`r`b`lDiamond helmet upgrade awarded for destroying part of enemy monument.`r

message.text: `e`l▲ `6Your team now has `e`lRegeneration`6 around your monuments`r
`e`l▲ `6Your team now has `e`lIron Leggings `r`6(Projectile Protection, Protection I)
`e`l▲ `6Your team now has `e`lIron Leggings `r`6(Projectile Protection, Protection II)
`e`l▲ `6Your team now has `e`lIron Leggings `r`6(Projectile Protection, Protection III)
`e`l▲ `6Your team now has `e`lIron Leggings `r`6(Projectile Protection, Protection IV)
`e`l▲ `6Your team now has an `e`lIron Sword`r`6 (Sharp I)`r
`e`l▲ `6Your team now has an `e`lIron Sword`r`6 (Sharp II)`r
`e`l▲ `6Team kit upgraded with double `e`lGapples and Vines`r
`e`l▲ `6Team Axe and Shovel upgraded to `e`lDiamond Efficiency I`r
`e`l▲ `6Your team now has `e`lSpeed I`r`6 at Home`r
`e`l▲ `6Your team now has a `e`lMining Fatigue Trap`r

item.lore: `7You permanently gain a|`7Power I, Infinity bow.|

item.lore: `7Gives Slowness for 9 seconds|`7and brief Confusion to enemies.|Right-click to launch|Cooldown: 1s|
